overview: JUST ANOTHER LIFE is a home video by B'z, released on December 11, 1991 on both VHS and LaserDisc. The release follows B'z on their first Pleasure tour, B'z LIVE-GYM "Pleasure'91". Along with the preceding release FILM RISKY the previous year, the pair of releases are the only two B'z home videos to not be later made available on DVD. However, the performances of "Dakara Sono Te wo Hanashite", "Taiyou no Komachi Angel", and "Easy Come, Easy Go!" have been included variously as bonuses accompanying B'z The Best XXV 1988-1998 and B'z COMPLETE SINGLE BOX.
title: JUST ANOTHER LIFE
